title: A Gangsta's Pledge 2
description: With the culprits still after them and new enemies forming, it seems like a peaceful life is the last thing possible for Saint and Nya. Friendship and family bonds are strained while the pieces from the fatal night are slowly put back together. Tables have turned and the characters find themselves trying to rebuild what was lost. Will Nya step up to the plate and be the woman a gangsta like Saint needs, or will their love become another casualty of the game?
author: E.L. Griffin
